page.title: 02A DAY IN THE LIFE OF EMMA..1
page.content: My school day begins at seven o'clock. I get up, clean my teeth and wash. After dressing I have my breakfast, usually Coco-pops covered with milk. Next, I make my bed, hoover and dust my bedroom, feed my guinea pigs and play with Honey, our puppy. At the bus-stop I meet my friends Anya, Rachel and Lianne. The bus takes us from Long Rock to the school gate. Usually we play in the play-ground or chat to our friends. When our headmistress rings the bell at 9.00 a.m., we go in to school. First Miss Wallis marks the register, then we have an assembly in the hall. We sing hymns and pray to God. I spend the day doing lessons like English, Mathematics, Reading, Geography, History, Music and Art and Craft.
